description: a(n+1) = a(n) + sum of digits in base 5 representation of a(n).
references: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, Section 2.24.
links: Index entries for Colombian or self numbers and related sequences
author: _Leonid Broukhis_
extensions: More terms from Neven Juric, Apr 11 2008
